core

Class Velocity

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Velocity

  • public class Velocity
extends java.lang.Object
    Velocity specifies the change in position on the `x` and the `y` axes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tomer Davidor, Guy Blachar

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double dx 
      private double dy 
      static double ROTATION_OF_AXES
      Stands for the difference between the normal angles and the angles specified in the assignment (up is 0 degrees, negative y).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Velocity(double dx, double dy)
      Constructor, Cartesian.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point applyToPoint(Point p)
      Take a point with position (x, y) and return a new point with position (x + dx, y + dy).
      boolean equals(Velocity velocity)
      Compares two velocities.
      static Velocity fromAngleAndSpeed(double angle, double speed)
      A static c'tor for velocity.
      double getAngle()
      Returns the angle of the velocity.
      double getDx() 
      double getDy() 
      double getSpeed()
      Returns the speed of the velocity.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • dx

        private double dx

      • dy

        private double dy

      • ROTATION_OF_AXES

        public static final double ROTATION_OF_AXES
        Stands for the difference between the normal angles and the angles specified in the assignment (up is 0 degrees, negative y).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Velocity

        public Velocity(double dx,
        double dy)
        Constructor, Cartesian.
        Parameters:
        dx - how many units to move in x direction
        dy - how many units to move in y direction

    • Method Detail

      • fromAngleAndSpeed

        public static Velocity fromAngleAndSpeed(double angle,
                         double speed)
        A static c'tor for velocity.
        Parameters:
        angle - the velocity vector's angle, 0 is up
        speed - how many units to move in that direction
        Returns:
        a velocity with the appropriate dx and dy

      • getDx

        public double getDx()
        Returns:
        the dx

      • getDy

        public double getDy()
        Returns:
        the dy

      • getSpeed

        public double getSpeed()
        Returns the speed of the velocity.
        Returns:
        sqrt((dx + dy)^2)

      • getAngle

        public double getAngle()
        Returns the angle of the velocity.
        Returns:
        atan(dy/dx) - 270 degrees

      • applyToPoint

        public Point applyToPoint(Point p)
        Take a point with position (x, y) and return a new point with position (x + dx, y + dy).
        Parameters:
        p - the point to move
        Returns:
        a new point in the wanted location

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Velocity velocity)
        Compares two velocities.
        Parameters:
        velocity - a velocity to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the velocities are equal, else false
